# append(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a new anchor at the end of the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func append(_ entity: any HasAnchoring)
```

## Parameters

- **entity**: The element to append to the collection.

## Adding anchors

- **append(contentsOf:)**: Adds anchors from an array to the end of this collection.
- **append(contentsOf:)**: Adds anchors from a sequence to the end of this collection.
